title: Quarterly Business Review Packet
summary: Package KPIs, narrative, risks, and next-quarter focus for the leadership review.
use_case: Equip executives with a concise, data-backed narrative before the QBR meeting.
guardrails: Lock all metrics to finance-approved sources.
Highlight red/yellow risks with accountable owners and follow-up dates.

fields.label: Headline metrics
fields.placeholder: NRR %, ARR growth, churn, customer adds

full_template:
# Quarterly Business Review
## Scorecard
- Metric | Target | Actual | Delta
- Commentary: {{headline commentary}}

## Highlights
- Win 1: {{details}}
- Win 2: {{details}}

## Challenges
- Risk | Owner | Mitigation | Due date

## Looking Ahead
- Priority 1
- Priority 2
- Priority 3

title: Annual Planning Workshop Agenda
summary: Facilitate a cross-functional planning session with goals, breakout prompts, and follow-ups.
use_case: Align teams on priorities and dependencies before committing to annual plans.
guardrails: Include an explicit parking lot for out-of-scope topics.
Assign a notetaker for each breakout block.
full_template:
## Workshop Agenda ({{date}})
| Time | Segment | Owner | Output |
|------|---------|-------|--------|
| 09:00 | Opening context | {{facilitator}} | Shared goals |
| 09:20 | FY recap lightning talks | {{speakers}} | Wins + misses notes |
| 10:00 | Breakout 1: Opportunities | {{team leads}} | Opportunity canvas |
| 11:00 | Synthesis & vote | Facilitator | Prioritized list |
| 11:30 | Breakout 2: Risks & enablers | {{team leads}} | Risk board |
| 12:15 | Commitments & next steps | Exec sponsor | Owners + deadlines |

### Breakout prompt
1. List the biggest bets.
2. Identify dependencies/blockers.
3. Nominate an accountable owner.

title: Scenario Planning Matrix
summary: Compare financial and operational outcomes across best/likely/worst case scenarios.
use_case: Stress-test the business against market, supply, or demand swings.
guardrails: Use consistent assumptions across scenarios for apples-to-apples comparison.
Document triggering signals that move the company between scenarios.

title: North Star Narrative
summary: Codify the long-term mission, customer promise, and guiding principles.
use_case: Provide teams with a durable narrative that anchors roadmaps and messaging.
guardrails: Avoid buzzwords; keep language concrete and customer-focused.
List proof points that can be validated.
full_template:
# North Star Narrative
## Mission
{{mission}}

## Who We Serve
- Primary persona: {{persona}}
- Pain we remove: {{pain}}

## Promise
"We enable {{persona}} to {{outcome}} without {{pain}}."

## Principles
1. Principle | Behaviours | Evidence

## Proof
- Metric / milestone / story

title: Initiative Intake Form
summary: Standardize how teams propose new initiatives, including funding, risk, and ROI.
use_case: Capture consistent data before the governance board reviews proposals.
guardrails: Require sponsor approval before submission.
Reject submissions missing ROI or risk statements.
full_template:
## Initiative Intake
1. Title & Sponsor
2. Problem & Desired Outcome
3. ROI Snapshot
   - Investment: {{amount}}
   - Payback: {{time horizon}}
4. Risks & Dependencies
5. Required Teams & FTE estimate
6. Launch timeline
7. Attachments

title: Operating Model Charter
summary: Define scope, decision rights, and KPIs for a new operating model or team.
use_case: Document how a new program will run, measure success, and interact with partners.
guardrails: Document escalation paths for stalled decisions.
List interfaces with other teams to avoid overlap.
full_template:
# Operating Model Charter
## Purpose
{{purpose}}

## Success Measures
- KPI | Target | Data source

## Decision Rights
- Decision | Owner | Escalation path

## Operating Cadence
| Meeting | Participants | Agenda | Output |

## Interfaces
- Partner team | Engagement mode | Notes

## Tooling & Source of Truth
{{tools}}

title: Customer Journey Workshop Kit
summary: Map end-to-end customer journeys, pain points, and opportunity areas.
use_case: Align cross-functional teams on current vs. target customer experiences.
guardrails: Invite customer-facing reps for first-hand insights.
Document evidence sources (call logs, surveys) for each insight.
full_template:
## Workshop Flow
1. Set the goal & persona.
2. Map current journey stages.
3. Capture moments of truth (delight + friction).
4. Score impact & effort.
5. Prioritize top three fixes.

### Journey Table
Stage | Task | Emotion | Evidence | Idea | Owner

title: Voice of Customer Digest
summary: Condense VOC signals into themes, impact, and recommended actions.
use_case: Keep stakeholders updated on customer sentiment and trending issues.
guardrails: Tag quotes with data classifications to avoid sharing restricted info.
Flag unverified anecdotes separately from trend data.
full_template:
# VOC Digest ({{timespan}})
## Sentiment Snapshot
- CSAT: {{value}} (Δ {{delta}})
- NPS: {{value}}

## Emerging Themes
1. Theme | Evidence | Impact | Suggested Action

## Wins Worth Amplifying
- Quote | Channel | Team to celebrate

## Next Steps
- Owner | Action | Due date

title: Onboarding Success Plan
summary: Draft the shared success checklist for new customers in their first 90 days.
use_case: Align success managers and customers on milestones, resources, and risk signals.
guardrails: Include measurable activation checkpoints.
Escalate if success criteria are unclear after kickoff.
full_template:
## Success Outcomes
- Primary goal: {{goal}}
- Leading indicators: {{metrics}}

## 30/60/90 Plan
Day 0-30 | Owner | Milestone | Status
Day 31-60 | ...
Day 61-90 | ...

## Risk Signals
- Risk | Trigger | Mitigation | Escalation

title: Advocacy Story Builder
summary: Document customer proof stories with before/after metrics and quotes.
use_case: Enable marketing and sales to reuse validated customer success stories.
guardrails: Secure written approval before publishing quotes.
Annotate embargo dates or confidentiality tiers.
full_template:
# Advocacy Story
## Headline
{{customer}} improved {{metric}} by {{result}} in {{timeframe}}.

## Challenge
{{context}}

## Solution
- Deployment overview
- Key features used

## Outcomes
- Metric | Before | After | Source

## Quotes
> "{{quote}}" — {{speaker}}

## Assets
- Slide | Owner | Link

title: Renewal Playbook Sheet
summary: Guide success managers through renewal prep, risk scoring, and negotiation levers.
use_case: Systematize renewal motions before, during, and after the negotiation window.
guardrails: Reference legal-approved discount guardrails.
Escalate red accounts to exec sponsor 45 days pre-renewal.

title: Daily Ops Standup Board
summary: Track handoffs, blockers, and metrics in a daily operations standup.
use_case: Keep operational teams aligned on priorities and incidents.
guardrails: Escalate blockers unresolved for 48 hours.
Archive cards older than seven days to keep the board lean.
full_template:
## Standup Columns
- Today
- Blocked
- Ready for Review
- Done

### Card Template
- Task
- Owner
- Status
- Dependencies
- Next check-in date

### Metrics Header
- SLA Misses (last 24h)
- Tickets in backlog
- Major incidents

title: Vendor Onboarding Checklist
summary: Ensure new vendors complete security, legal, and finance onboarding tasks.
use_case: Prevent go-live delays by standardizing vendor onboarding steps.
guardrails: Block production access until security review is complete.
Collect SOC2 / ISO evidence before data exchange.
full_template:
## Vendor Onboarding Tasks
- NDA executed (Legal)
- Security questionnaire received (Security)
- Access request submitted (IT)
- Billing setup (Finance)
- Kickoff scheduled (Business owner)

Status Legend: Not started / In progress / Complete

title: Incident Postmortem Template
summary: Capture root cause, impact, remediation, and learning actions from incidents.
use_case: Create consistent, blameless postmortems with actionable follow-ups.
guardrails: Use a blameless tone; focus on systems not individuals.
Document timelines with verified data only.
full_template:
# Incident Postmortem
## Summary
- Severity: {{sev}}
- Impact: {{impact}}

## Timeline
| Time | Event | Source |

## Root Cause
{{analysis}}

## Remediation
- Immediate fix
- Long-term fix

## Action Items
- Owner | Action | Due date | Status

## Lessons Learned
- Monitoring
- Process
- Documentation

title: Capacity Planning Workbook
summary: Model headcount and throughput capacity by role over upcoming quarters.
use_case: Forecast when teams hit capacity limits and require hiring or automation.
guardrails: Use attrition assumptions approved by HR.
Flag any utilization above 90% for more than one quarter.

title: Policy Rollout Comms Plan
summary: Coordinate messaging, training, and confirmation steps for new policies.
use_case: Ensure the org adopts new policies with clarity and documented acknowledgment.
guardrails: Track acknowledgments with audit-ready evidence.
Escalate to managers if teams have <80% completion ahead of deadline.
full_template:
## Channels & Cadence
- Announcement email ({{date}})
- Manager briefing ({{date}})
- LMS module ({{date}})
- Reminder cadence

## Key Messages
- What changed
- Why now
- How to comply

## Tracking
- Audience | Completion % | Owner

title: Sales Discovery Call Script
summary: Guide reps through discovery questions, signals, and next-step commitments.
use_case: Ensure consistent discovery conversations that uncover value and urgency.
guardrails: Include fallback prompts if the prospect is new to the category.
Capture verbatim pain statements for CRM.
full_template:
## Opening
- Rapport question
- Agenda preview

## Discovery
1. Current process question
2. Impact question
3. Success metric
4. Stakeholder alignment

## Qualify
- Timeline
- Budget
- Authority

## Next Steps
- Recap value
- Confirm action + owner + date

title: Product Launch Enablement Brief
summary: Equip go-to-market teams with positioning, talk tracks, objection handling, and proof.
use_case: Ensure sales/support teams adopt new product messaging quickly.
guardrails: Tag messages that require compliance approval.
Link to demo scripts and FAQ resources.
full_template:
# Launch Enablement Brief
## Positioning
- For {{persona}} who {{need}}, {{product}} is the solution that {{value}} because {{proof}}.

## Top 3 Messages
1. Message | Evidence | CTA

## Demo Highlights
- Step | Key takeaway

## Objection Handling
- Objection | Response | Proof

## Resources
- Asset | Link | Owner

title: Internal Workshop Plan
summary: Plan an internal training workshop with learning objectives and exercises.
use_case: Upskill internal teams on new processes, tools, or playbooks.
guardrails: Include practice scenarios and peer feedback loops.
Collect pre/post confidence scores for impact tracking.
full_template:
## Workshop Outline ({{duration}})
| Time | Module | Format | Materials |
|------|--------|--------|-----------|
| 00:00 | Welcome & objectives | Presentation | Slides |
| 00:15 | Concept overview | Demo | Deck |
| 00:35 | Scenario practice | Breakouts | Worksheets |
| 01:10 | Peer feedback | Share-out | Debrief doc |
| 01:30 | Action commitments | Individual | Planner |

## Follow-Up
- Survey link
- Coaching plan

title: Field Readiness Checklist
summary: Verify all prerequisites before rolling out a new workflow to field teams.
use_case: Avoid failed rollouts by ensuring training, tools, and support are ready.
guardrails: Run a pilot and capture feedback before global launch.
Document which teams have accepted the change.
full_template:
## Readiness Criteria
- Documentation published
- Training delivered
- Tool access provisioned
- Support runbook updated
- Metrics dashboard live

## Launch Tracker
Region | Training complete | Tools enabled | Go-live date | Notes

title: Content Governance Playbook
summary: Outline how internal content is requested, reviewed, approved, and archived.
use_case: Prevent outdated or off-brand content from circulating.
guardrails: Define SLAs for each review stage.
Archive content automatically after review cadence expiration.
full_template:
# Content Governance
## Intake
- Request form fields
- Routing rules

## Review Workflow
Stage | Actor | SLA | Criteria

## Approval Matrix
- Content type | Approver | Backup

## Lifecycle
- Publish | Notify | Archive date
- Versioning rules

## Quality Checks
- Style compliance
- Legal/brand review

title: Incident Response Runbook
summary: Coordinate cross-functional response when AI-assisted workflows generate incidents.
use_case: Ensure rapid triage, communication, and remediation for AI-related incidents.
guardrails: Escalate critical severity incidents to the executive bridge within 15 minutes.
Log all remediation steps in the risk tracker for audit.
full_template:
# Incident Response Runbook
## Detection
- Source alert | Time | Owner
- Confirm signal validity

## Containment
- Immediate actions
- Access restrictions
- Stakeholder notification list

## Eradication
- Root cause steps
- Validation checks

## Recovery
- Service restoration plan
- Post-recovery monitoring

## Postmortem
- Timeline
- Contributing factors
- Corrective actions
- Follow-up owners & due dates

title: Prompt QA Review Checklist
summary: Vet new prompts for accuracy, bias, privacy, and maintenance requirements.
use_case: Standardize quality reviews before deploying prompts to teams.
guardrails: Always verify outputs against a gold answer set before approval.
Reject prompts that lack owner or review cadence metadata.
full_template:
## Prompt QA Checklist
- Coverage of expected inputs?
- Handles edge cases?
- Bias/ethics review complete?
- Guardrails documented?
- Owner + review cadence set?
- Pilot test results attached?

## Approval Log
Reviewer | Date | Decision | Notes

title: Model Change Impact Assessment
summary: Assess downstream impacts of model or configuration changes before rollout.
use_case: Prevent regressions when updating model versions, temperature, or policies.
guardrails: Run regression suite across high-risk prompts before approving changes.
Document rollback triggers and responsible teams.
full_template:
# Model Change Impact Assessment
## Summary
- Change owner
- Requested go-live

## Risk Review
- Affected workflows
- Regulatory considerations
- Data privacy notes

## Testing
- Regression suite status
- Quality metrics comparison

## Rollback Plan
- Trigger thresholds
- Rollback owner
- Communication steps

## Decision
- Approver | Date | Outcome | Conditions

title: Safety Review Board Agenda
summary: Facilitate monthly AI safety review boards with metrics, incidents, and approvals.
use_case: Ensure accountable oversight for AI deployments and incidents.
guardrails: Capture board decisions with action owners and deadlines.
Escalate unresolved risks to the compliance committee.
full_template:
## Safety Review Board Agenda
1. Opening & quorum check
2. Metrics review (quality, incidents, escalations)
3. New deployment requests
4. Incident follow-ups
5. Policy updates
6. Decisions & approvals
7. Parking lot

## Decision Register
Topic | Decision | Owner | Due date | Follow-up

title: Bias Monitoring Dashboard Brief
summary: Outline metrics, review cadence, and escalation paths for bias monitoring.
use_case: Keep product and compliance teams aligned on bias monitoring signals.
guardrails: Define thresholds that trigger human review and policy escalation.
Ensure demographic data handling complies with privacy policies.
full_template:
# Bias Monitoring Brief
## Overview
- Workflow
- Monitoring owner

## Metrics
| Metric | Target | Threshold | Notes |
|--------|--------|-----------|-------|

## Review Cadence
- Weekly checks
- Monthly deep-dive
- Quarterly audit

## Escalation Matrix
Severity | Trigger | Owner | Action

## Improvements Backlog
- Item | Priority | Owner | ETA

title: Integration Rollout Plan
summary: Coordinate phased release of a new integration with training, monitoring, and rollback triggers.
use_case: Launch a new integration safely across pilot, limited, and GA stages.
guardrails: Gate each phase behind readiness checks and observability sign-off.
Document rollback command and incident channel before launch.
full_template:
# Rollout Overview
- Integration: {{Integration name}}
- Goal: {{Business objective}}
- Owner: {{Owner}}
- Pilot cohort: {{Pilot cohort}}

## Phase Plan
| Phase | Start | End | Cohort | Entry criteria | Exit criteria |
|-------|-------|-----|--------|----------------|---------------|
| Pilot | | | | | |
| Limited | | | | | |
| GA | | | | | |

## Preconditions
- Monitoring dashboard link
- Support playbook link
- Rollback command + owner

## Communications
Channel | Audience | Message owner | Timing

## Risk Tracker
Risk | Mitigation | Watch owner | Trigger

title: Webhook Failure Runbook
summary: Restore failing webhooks with clear triage, retry, and customer communication steps.
use_case: Handle webhook outages or schema drift impacting downstream tools.
guardrails: Never reprocess payloads without confirming idempotency keys.
Escalate to legal/comms if customer impact crosses SLA.
full_template:
# Webhook Failure Runbook
## Detection
- Alarm name
- First failure timestamp
- Impacted tenants

## Diagnosis
- Recent deploys?
- Schema drift?
- Rate limits?

## Remediation
- Pause downstream processors
- Apply fix / redeploy
- Replay queue (idempotent check)

## Communication
Audience | Channel | Owner | Message

## Post-Incident
- Root cause summary
- Permanent fix
- Follow-up actions

title: Tool Permission Audit Checklist
summary: Audit connected tools for least-privilege access and stale credentials.
use_case: Quarterly review to ensure integrations use scoped service accounts and rotated secrets.
guardrails: Disable unused credentials immediately after discovery.
Record approvals for any elevated scopes.
full_template:
## Permission Audit Checklist
- Service account exists with least privilege
- Admin console shows last login < 30 days
- Secrets stored in vault with rotation date
- Feature flags documented
- Break-glass user verified

## Findings Log
Item | Status | Owner | Due date

title: Automation Handoff Brief
summary: Document how an automation hands off work between ChatGPT and a downstream system.
use_case: Align operations and engineering on ownership for each automation step.
guardrails: List manual fallback paths for each failure state.
Include metrics and alerts owners verified.
full_template:
# Automation Handoff Brief
## Flow Overview
Step | System | Owner | Trigger | Output

## Guardrails
- Validation checks
- Alert thresholds
- Manual fallback steps

## Observability
Metric | Target | Alert owner | Notes

## Contacts
Role | Name | Channel | Escalation window
